comment: /** * Returns the signer keys for the given user ID parts. This method is used * for signing. * * @param exchange * exchange, can be null * @param useridParts * parts of User IDs, can be null or empty, then an * empty list must be returned * @return list of secret keys with their private keys and User Ids which * corresponds to one of the useridParts, must not be * null, can be empty */
code: /** * Returns the signer keys for the given user ID parts. This method is used * for signing. * * @param exchange * exchange, can be null * @param useridParts * parts of User IDs, can be null or empty, then an * empty list must be returned * @return list of secret keys with their private keys and User Ids which * corresponds to one of the useridParts, must not be * null, can be empty */ List getSignerKeys(Exchange exchange, List useridParts) throws Exception.

comment: /** * Returns the private key with a certain key ID. This method is used for * decrypting. * * @param exchange * exchange, can be null * * @param keyId * key ID * @return private key or null if the key cannot be found */
code: /** * Returns the private key with a certain key ID. This method is used for * decrypting. * * @param exchange * exchange, can be null * * @param keyId * key ID * @return private key or null if the key cannot be found */ PGPPrivateKey getPrivateKey(Exchange exchange, long keyId) throws Exception.
